typeDescriptions.typeString: struct PakbetUseCase.Student storage ref[] storage ref
struct PakbetUseCase.Student storage ref[] storage ref

accreditIssuer(address,string).details: Only the owner of the smart contract account can call this function.

params._issuerAddress: Blockchain Address associated to the training institution.

params._hashCode: the resulting value when pdf is hashed.
params._studentAddress: Blockchain Address associated to the student.
params._templateId: uint256 value corresponding to the index position of template in the templates[] array.

awardRegularCertificate(bytes32).details: Record the hash value of the pdf document to the blockchain account.

params._hashCode: the resulting value when pdf is hashed.

awardRegularCertificate(bytes32).return: true if awarding of certificate is good, false if awarding of certificate fails.

createTemplate(string,string).details: Only account in the issuer[] array can call this function.

params._description: certificate description e.g. BTA Expert Program
params._title: certificate description e.g. Certificate of Attendance.

params._index: uint256 value corresponding to the index position of the training institution in the issuers[] array.

enrollStudent(address).details: Only accredited account can call this function.

params._studentAddress: Blockchain Address associated to the student.

params._id: uint256 value corresponding to the index position of the training institution

getIssuedTemplates(uint256).return: an array containing the template ids created template by the institution

params._id: uint256 value corresponding to the index position of the student in the students[] array.

getStudentCertificates(uint256).return: an array containing the certificate ids owned by the student.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params._index: uint256 value corresponding to the index position of the training institution in the issuers[] array.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._hashCode: the resulting value when pdf is hashed.

validateRegularCertificate(bytes32).return: true if Certificate exist in the blockchain, false if not.

accreditIssuer(address,string).notice: Add training institution to the blockchain.

awardRegularCertificate(bytes32).notice: Only accredited account can call this function.

createTemplate(string,string).notice: Creates blank certificates which will become basis for certificates to be issued.

deActivateIssuerById(uint256).notice: Prevent a training institution from creating and awarding certificates.

reActivateIssuerById(uint256).notice: Allows a training institution from creating and awarding certificates.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
